00040 #ifndef CONVERSIONS_H
00041 #define CONVERSIONS_H
00042 
00043 #include <nav_msgs/Odometry.h>
00044 #include <nav_msgs/Path.h>
00045 #include <kdl/frames.hpp>
00046 #include <kdl/path_composite.hpp>
00047 
00048 #include "navigation_trajectory_common/FrameWithId.h"
00049 #include "navigation_trajectory_common/TwistWithId.h"
00050 
00054 namespace conversions {
00055 
00061     inline void odometryRosToFrame(const nav_msgs::Odometry& odometry, FrameWithId& pose) {
00062         const geometry_msgs::Quaternion& orientation = odometry.pose.pose.orientation;
00063         const geometry_msgs::Point& position = odometry.pose.pose.position;
00064         pose.id = odometry.header.frame_id;
00065         KDL::Frame& poseKDL = pose.getFrame();
00066         poseKDL.M = KDL::Rotation::Quaternion(orientation.x, orientation.y, orientation.z, orientation.w);
00067         poseKDL.p = KDL::Vector(position.x, position.y, position.z);
00068     }
00069 
00075      inline void odometryRosToTwist(const nav_msgs::Odometry& odometry, TwistWithId& twist) {
00076         const geometry_msgs::Vector3& angular = odometry.twist.twist.angular;
00077         const geometry_msgs::Vector3& linear = odometry.twist.twist.linear;
00078         twist.id = odometry.header.frame_id;
00079         twist.getTwist().rot = KDL::Vector(angular.x, angular.y, angular.z);
00080         twist.getTwist().vel = KDL::Vector(linear.x, linear.y, linear.z);
00081     }
00082 
00089     inline void poseRosToFrame(const geometry_msgs::Pose& poseRos, const std::string& id, FrameWithId& pose) {
00090         const geometry_msgs::Quaternion& orientation = poseRos.orientation;
00091         const geometry_msgs::Point& position = poseRos.position;
00092         pose.id = id;
00093         KDL::Frame& poseKDL = pose.getFrame();
00094         poseKDL.M = KDL::Rotation::Quaternion(orientation.x, orientation.y, orientation.z, orientation.w);
00095         poseKDL.p = KDL::Vector(position.x, position.y, position.z);
00096     }
00097 
00103     inline void poseStampedRosToFrame(const geometry_msgs::PoseStamped& poseStamped, FrameWithId& pose) {
00104         poseRosToFrame(poseStamped.pose, poseStamped.header.frame_id, pose);
00105     }
00106 
00113     inline void frameToPoseRos(const FrameWithId& pose, geometry_msgs::Pose& poseRos, std::string& id) {
00114         id = pose.id;
00115         const KDL::Frame& poseKDL = pose.getFrame();
00116         poseKDL.M.GetQuaternion(poseRos.orientation.x,
00117                 poseRos.orientation.y,
00118                 poseRos.orientation.z,
00119                 poseRos.orientation.w);
00120         poseRos.position.x = poseKDL.p.x();
00121         poseRos.position.y = poseKDL.p.y();
00122         poseRos.position.z = poseKDL.p.z();
00123     }
00124 
00130     inline void frameToPoseStampedRos(const FrameWithId& pose, geometry_msgs::PoseStamped& poseStamped) {
00131         frameToPoseRos(pose, poseStamped.pose, poseStamped.header.frame_id);
00132     }
00133 
00139     inline void pathToPathRos(const std::vector<FrameWithId>& path, std::vector <geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>& pathRos) {
00140         if (!path.empty()) {
00141             std::vector<FrameWithId>::const_iterator it = path.begin();
00142             geometry_msgs::PoseStamped pose;
00143             while (it != path.end()) {
00144                 frameToPoseStampedRos(*it, pose);
00145                 pathRos.push_back(pose);
00146                 ++it;
00147             }
00148         }
00149     }
00150 
00156     inline void pathToPathRos(const std::vector<FrameWithId>& path, nav_msgs::Path& pathRos) {
00157         if (!path.empty()) {
00158             std::vector<FrameWithId>::const_iterator it = path.begin();
00159             pathRos.header.frame_id = it->id;
00160             pathToPathRos(path, pathRos.poses);
00161         }
00162     }
00163 
00169     inline void pathRosToPath(const std::vector <geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>& pathRos, std::vector<FrameWithId>& path) {
00170         if (!pathRos.empty()) {
00171             std::vector <geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>::const_iterator it = pathRos.begin();
00172             FrameWithId pose;
00173             while (it != pathRos.end()) {
00174                 poseStampedRosToFrame(*it, pose);
00175                 path.push_back(pose);
00176                 ++it;
00177             }
00178         }
00179     }
00180 
00186     inline void pathRosToPath(const nav_msgs::Path& pathRos, std::vector<FrameWithId>& path) {
00187         pathRosToPath(pathRos.poses, path);
00188     }
